channel.title: Sprite Changes
channel.description:
I am using a client, and I want to change the sprites on it. Specifically the inventory + tabs and the chatbox + buttons.
I do not want my current chatbox + buttons, which are these: [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2me9taw.jpg[/img]
I do want this chatbox + buttons, which are this: [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2411so4.jpg[/img]
How do I edit my chatbox + buttons to make it look like the second screenshot?

item.title: Sprite Changes
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

get toms cache editor and replace the sprites with your new ones

Read full topic
